description: Try our easy to follow Soba Noodles With Tofu & Miso Dressing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Noodle salad,Quick & easy dinner,Low saturated fat,High fibre,High protein,Low sugar,Tofu
name: Soba Noodles With Tofu & Miso Dressing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 200g japanese marinated firm tofu, cut into thick strips

recipeInstructions.text: Cook noodles in boiling water according to packet instructions, adding peas and snow peas for the last minute of cooking time. Drain. Refresh under cold water. Drain.

Meanwhile, whisk juice, miso, horseradish, 1 tbs water and oil in a large bowl until combined. Add noodles, peas, rocket, carrot and onions and toss to coat. Serve salad topped with tofu and scattered with nori.
